Name: DaVinci Code
Ingredients: 5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Snifter/Brandy balloon glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Coffee and salted caramel stirred with cognac and a splash of tawny port.
History: Adapted from a 2015 recipe by Matyas Busek at Chiltern Firehouse in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of DaVinci Code contains 188 calories
